profile: Carisbrooke Developments Ltd is a boutique builder of spec and custom homes specializing in Calgary in-fill development.  Every Carisbrooke home is unique, built to the highest standards, and designed to fit your life.Carisbrooke is a low volume builder able to work closely with you on all building details and giving exceptional service. Our team can give you a personal touch to ensure your home exceeds all of your expectations.All our homes are built using only qualified sub-trades and all work is rigorously inspected at all stages.  Carisbrooke Developments Ltd is a member of the Alberta New Home Program,Better Business Bureau, and Calgary Home Builders Association.
name: Carisbrooke Homes Ltd

profile:
Covenant Restorations specializes in servicing damaged bathtubs - old or new. Damages caused to brand new bath tubs during installation can be frustrating and very costly. We can repair those chips and scratches to hide the damage.  We can also repair old bath tubs and give them an entire new finish in almost any colour.

Covenant Restorations Ltd.
•	Specializing in bathtub, shower stall, tub surround repair and refinishing
•	Servicing Calgary and Edmonton and surrounding areas since 1991
•	Proudly service Southern Alberta, including Red Deer, and the Rockies
•	Main office and shop located in Airdrie, AB 
•	Full WCB coverage
•	Licensed and insured

Services offered:
•	Full re-glazing of bathtubs, jetted tubs, shower stalls and tub surrounds
•	Spot repairs (repairing only the scratch, chip, dent, holes and cracks, etc.)
•	Can repair/refinish acrylic, porcelain, fibreglass, cast iron, steel
•	Colour changes/colour matches
•	Removal of existing tub liners
•	Non-slip surface application
•	Urinal repairs

Benefits:
•	Cost effective; less expensive that replacing
•	Time saving; takes less time and less mess to refinish than to replace
•	High quality finish
•	Usable within 24 hours in most cases
•	Professional workmanship
•	Refinishing tubs allows for property managers and hotel owners to keep renting with pride and increases the ability to sell homes for real estate professionals, contractors and home owners alike.

Our office is located in Airdrie, AB, and all of our service calls are booked through this office. 

Thank you for your time in considering Covenant Restorations to work with any tub repairs you may have.  Call us at our toll free number at 1-877-585-5053. We look forward to providing you with a free, no obligation quote or answering any questions you have.
name: Covenant Restorations
